attributes.action: There’s a prescription drug shortage. It needs stopping
attributes.additional_details:
There is a site that clearly shows the shortages on a monthly scale. 

I myself rely upon a long term antibiotic and unable to obtain it, my chemist has been trying for two weeks to no avail. 
This problem needs addressing as it may have dire consequences
attributes.background: There is a shortage of quite a few prescription drugs of which I truly hope it doesn’t end up as a catastrophe. I don’t know whether is due to the impending Brexit and stock pulling by people but this is creating a problem for others as they can not get their drugs that they rely upon.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do to address shortages of prescription drugs.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
